talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Hey! You're a voe, aren't you?


So the rumors were true! There is a voe
in town.

You don't look like the voe dummies from
the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff> though.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>But I guess you look like how I imagine a
voe looks.

Anyway! I'm Pearle. Nice to meet you!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>And you, voe. If you need something,
could you speak with me instead?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>This is <clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>! She's a vai who became
my sister recently.

Well, I mean...<sp:5:1:0> Not like my blood-related
sister. But I think of her like she's family!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseL_01>I got all caught up looking at that
"secret map" of Aaqlet's and made
myself late!
<clr:0000>Ms. Ashai<clr:ffff> is scary when she gets mad!
I need to hurry to class!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseL_01>I always feel so safe when others are
sleeping nearby... But then I oversleep,
and I can't be late for class!
If I am, <clr:0000>Ms. Ashai<clr:ffff> will be mad! I need
to hurry!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>My sister, Rotana, told me that
<clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff> has been doing <clr:0000>mysterious
divinations <clr:ffff>lately!
I'm completely stumped on Aaqlet's
secret map-puzzle thing, so...

I think I'll go try and figure out the
mystery surrounding Patricia instead!

I need to make it to Patricia before it
gets dark.

I'll see you later! Sav'orq!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>By the way, my actual older sister is
a scholar! Isn't that incredible?

I think that I'll become a scholar, too,
when I grow up!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Did you come here to listen to Patricia
make <clr:0000>mysterious divinations<clr:ffff>?

I heard that she gives them if you give her
a <clr:0000>splash fruit<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>But all she shares are strange numbers!
I don't understand what she's trying to
say at all.
Could it be some kind of secret code?
Maybe a location?

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmmm. It'd be amazing proof of my scholarly
potential if I could solve this puzzle...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hey, mister voe. Do you know what this
wall painting means?

Aaqlet says it's some kind of <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>...


But it doesn't match anything in the
<clr:0000>shelter <clr:ffff>at all!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseL_00>Shhh, don't talk to me right now! If <clr:0000>Ms.<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Ashai<clr:ffff> sees me talking to you...
talk0004:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Unconscious_01>Today I had to study how voe make decisions, and I
tried to figure out <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>'s divinations... I used my
brain so much...<sp:5:1:0> I need to sleep.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0015:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Unconscious_01>Today I had to study how voe make decisions, and I
tried to figure out the map's mysteries... I used my
brain so much...<sp:5:1:0> I need to sleep.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>The painting on this wall is supposed to
be a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> of some kind...

But it <clr:0000>doesn't match anything in the
shelter <clr:ffff>at all!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmmm...<sp:5:0:0> It'd be amazing proof of my scholarly
potential if I could solve this puzzle...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>I want to be a great scholar... <sp:5:0:0>I'll be just
like Rotana...
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>You can hear Patricia's <clr:0000>mysterious
divinations<clr:ffff> if you offer her some
<clr:0000>splash fruit<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But all she shares are <clr:0000>strange numbers<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:1:0>
I wonder if it's some kind of secret code...

Maybe it somehow points to a <clr:0000>location<clr:ffff>?


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmmm...<sp:5:0:0> It'd be amazing proof of my scholarly
potential if I could solve this puzzle...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I'm so tired... Voe are more difficult to
understand than any puzzle...
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Work_01>Pearle!


You know you're not yet allowed to talk
to voe!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>So tired... Voe behavior doesn't make
any sense at all...
